pathAssistantSteps.info: This Order has been Approved! The related Shared Solar System and related subscriptions will be automatically updated.

This Order has not been submitted for Approval yet! Click the "Submit for Approval" button to kick of the approval process. Once an Order has been submitted for Approval, it can't be updated. Once an Order is approved, the related Shared Solar System will be updated with the new values.
This Order has been submitted for Approval! Once it's been approved, the related Shared Solar System and related subscriptions will be automatically updated.

This Order was Rejected. See the "Approvals" related list to see the user that rejected it, along with any comments they left. If you'd like to submit this Order for approval again, click the "Submit for Approval" button.
